mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION_LIST ( RESTAURANT_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVE_DAY, RESERVE_TIME, NUMBER_OF_GUESTS, ) VALUES ( #{restaurantNo}, #{memberNo}, #{reserveDay}, #{reserveTime}, #{numberOfGuests}, )
mapper.select: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESERVATION_LIST RL JOIN TB_RESERVATION_SETTING RS ON (RS.RESTAURANT_NO = RL.RESTAURANT_NO) WHERE RL.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND RL.RESERVE_DAY = #{reserveDay} AND RL.RESERVE_TIME = #{reserveTime}) < (SELECT MAX_TEAM_NUM FROM TB_RESERVATION_SETTING WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo})
SELECT RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo, INTERVAL interval, MAX_NUM maxNum, MIN_NUM minNum, DESCRIPTION description FROM TB_RESERVATION_SETTING WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}

SELECT B.BREAK_START_TIME breakStartTime, B.BREAK_END_TIME breakEndTime, AT.RESERVATION_START_TIME reservationStartTime, AT.RESERVATION_START_END reservationEndTime, RS.INTERVAL interval FROM TB_BREAKTIME B RIGHT JOIN TB_OPERATING_HOURS OH ON (OH.OPERATING_HOURS_NO = B.OPERATING_HOURS_NO) JOIN TB_AVAILABLE_TIME AT ON (AT.OPERATING_HOUR_NO = OH.OPERATING_HOURS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION_SETTING RS ON (RS.RESTAURANT_NO = OH.RESTAURANT_NO) WHERE OH.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND OH.WEEKDAY = #{weekDay}

SELECT RL.RESERVE_TIME reserveTime, COUNT(*) count FROM TB_RESERVATION_LIST RL JOIN TB_RESERVATION_SETTING RS ON (RS.RESTAURANT_NO = RL.RESTAURANT_NO) WHERE RL.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND RL.RESERVE_DAY = #{reserveDay} AND RL.RESERVE_TIME = #{reserveTime} GROUP BY RL.RESERVE_TIME,RS.MAX_TEAM_NUM HAVING COUNT(*) >= RS.MAX_TEAM_NUM
